lead_paragraph: An effort to commemorate a once-thriving mixed-race community reinvigorates a long simmering debate about the accuracy of local history.

headline.print_headline: Fighting to Preserve a Chapter of Local History
headline.main: Fighting to Preserve a Chapter of Setauket History

snippet: An effort to commemorate a once-thriving mixed-race community reinvigorates a long simmering debate about the accuracy of local history.
abstract: Robert Lewis and historical anthropologist Christopher N Matthews are heading effort to preserve Bethel-Christian Avenue-Laurel Hill Historic District, historically mixed-race neighborhood in Setauket; gentrification of half-mile long stretch raises urgency to get federal government to recognize district's important place in social and racial history of New York (Metropolitan/Long Island).
